alert.note: Alert for McHenry (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued August 24 at 2:57PM CDT until August 24 at 3:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM CDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL MCHENRY COUNTY... At 257 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 6 miles south of Karlsruhe, or 34 miles northwest of Harvey, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Balfour and Bergen. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
